comment.author: 67216972@N07
comment._content: That's my Great Aunt Geraldine!  It's interesting to see the more modern suit against the backdrop of conservative Mennonite clothing.

comment.author: 52529054@N06
comment._content: Thanks for your comment, Miriam.  Good observation!  I think it would be really interesting to look at the full run of the Mennonite Community magazine (for which this photograph was taken) and analyze the justaposition of old / conservative fashions with modern fashions in dress, home decor, etc.
